📊 Number of Positions: 4
About the Role:

We are looking for talented UX Designers to join our team! As a fresher, you’ll be responsible for creating user-centered design solutions through field research and usability testing. If you have a strong passion for UX/Product Design and a willingness to learn, we'd love to hear from you!

Mandatory Requirements:

👉 Strong UX/Product Design profile with a mandatory portfolio showcasing relevant projects.

👉 Familiarity with user-centric design processes, user research, and usability testing.

👉 B.Des or M.Des degree from NID, IIT, or any Tier 1 design school in India or reputed international universities (No Diploma courses considered).

Note:

🚀 Freshers who can join immediately.
🚀 Outstation candidates will not be considered.

Hello everyone, hope you are having a fun weekend. My friend and I have started a page on LinkedIn to share useful resources, tips, networks and realities (that no one really talks about) about building an international career in public policy.

We are both from India who moved to the US to pursue a Master’s in Public Policy from Georgetown University. We hope to share everything we have learnt along the way!
